endpoints.description: The caa_records relationship returns a list of all domain's CAA records
endpoints.name: domain caa records

endpoints.description: The cname_records relationship returns a list of all domain's CNAME records
endpoints.name: domain cname records

endpoints.description: All SSL certificates that have been associated with the domain at some moment in time.
endpoints.name: domain historical ssl certs

endpoints.description: All whois records that have been associated with the domain at some moment in time.
endpoints.name: domain historical whois

endpoints.description: The mx_records relationship returns a list of all domain's MX records.
endpoints.name: domain mx records

endpoints.description: The ns_records relationship returns a list of all domain's NS records.
endpoints.name: domain ns records

endpoints.description: The parent relationship returns the domain's object parent.
endpoints.name: domain parent

endpoints.description: The resolutions relationship returns a list of past and current IP resolutions for a given domain or subdomain.
endpoints.name: domain resolutions

endpoints.description: The siblings relationship returns a list of subdomains at the same level as the given subdomain for a domain, along with their information.
endpoints.name: domain siblings

endpoints.description: The soa_records relationship returns a list of all domain's CNAME records.
endpoints.name: domain soa records

endpoints.description: The subdomains relationship returns a list of all domain's subdomains. This relationships only returns direct subdomains, it's not recursive (it won't return a subdomain's subdomains).
endpoints.name: domain subdomains

endpoints.description: The urls relationship returns a list of the domain's URLs
endpoints.name: domain urls

endpoints.description: The historical_ssl_certificates relationship returns a list of SSL certificates that have been associated with the IP address at some moment in time.
endpoints.name: ip historical ssl certs

endpoints.description: The historical_whois relationship returns a list of whois records that have been associated with the IP address at some moment in time.
endpoints.name: ip historical whois

endpoints.description: The resolutions relationship returns a list of past and current domain resolutions for a IP address.
endpoints.name: ip resolutions

endpoints.description: The urls relationship returns a list of the IP's URLs
endpoints.name: ip urls

endpoints.description: Returns all the available data assosiated with domain, uses v2 api
endpoints.name: v2 api domain

endpoints.description: Returns all the available data assosiated with ip-address, uses v2 api
endpoints.name: v2 api ipaddress

info.description:
Analyze suspicious files and URLs to detect types of malware, 
automaticsubdomainIpy share them with the security community
info.name: VirusTotal
